overview: Karl co-founded ConnectWithCoaches; he is responsible for product vision and business development. Over the past 17 years Karl has worked in many areas of the development and delivery of products to customers. He spent 10 years at FRx Software Corporation â€“ a Microsoft subsidiary as one of the first team members of the startup company where he held various roles ranging from Director, Quality Assurance to Managing Product Management. After FRx was purchased by Microsoft in 2000, he continued his work as Program Manager on the Business Intelligence team within Microsoft Business Solutions Division. His next move was to help another startup company; AdPay Corporation where he held the position as Director, Quality Assurance. He also held the position at Jeppesen Corporation â€“ a Boeing subsidiary where he currently holds the position as Manager of Software Requirements, Software Configuration Management, and Technical Documentation. He currently holds the positon of Director of Program Management at Spatialinfo. Karl graduated with a Bachelors degree in Business Management from the University of Phoenix.
